channel.title: R on Hooked on Data
channel.description: Recent content in R on Hooked on Data

item.title: The Lesser Known Stars of the Tidyverse
item.description: In early 2018, I gave a few conference talks on “The Lesser Known Stars of the Tidyverse.” I focused on some packages and functions that aren’t as well known as the core parts of ggplot2 and dplyr but are very helpful in exploratory analysis. I walked through an example analysis of Kaggle’s 2017 State of Data Science and Machine Learning Survey to show how I would use these functions in an exploratory analysis.
